response.original_title: Yes, No, Goodbye - The Ouija Board Documentary
response.overview: Find out what happens when a group of documentary filmmakers test the power and taboos surrounding Ouija boards and spirit boards.  Follow the team as they travel across the U.S. to meet with witches, warlocks, voodoo practitioners to gain insight on how spirit boards are used in different religions and practices.
response.tagline: Find out what happens when Ouija boards stop being polite and start getting real
response.title: Yes, No, Goodbye - The Ouija Board Documentary
